content: Bandits is a comedy crime film about two friends, Joe and Terry, who escape from prison and become infamous bank robbers known for their charismatic personalities and their habit of taking hostages. As they continue their crime spree, they develop a complicated love triangle with a bored housewife named Kate, who joins them on their adventures. Despite their success, they are pursued by an eccentric detective, determined to have them arrested. In the end, the trio confronts their true feelings and faces the consequences of their actions.
